definitions.definition: The discipline which deals with the measurement and representation of Earth , its gravitational field and geodynamic phenomena (polar motion, Earth tides, and crustal motion) in three-dimensional, time-varying space

main_definition: ( sciences , geography ) The discipline which deals with the measurement and representation of Earth , its gravitational field and geodynamic phenomena (polar motion, Earth tides, and crustal motion) in three-dimensional, time-varying space
